PageTitle: mpls te bfd enable one-arm-echo primary (Tunnel interface view)
FuncDef:
The mpls te bfd enable one-arm-echo primary command is used to enable the BFD for TE LSP on the primary LSP of the tunnel. The primary will be disabled by the undo mpls te bfd enable command.
By default, BFD for TE LSP is disabled.
CLIs: mpls te bfd enable one-arm-echo primary
Examples: [*HUAWEI-Tunnel1] mpls te bfd enable one-arm-echo primary
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The mpls te bfd enable one-arm-echo primary command is used to enable the BFD for TE LSP on the primary LSP of the tunnel.
